attributes.action: Boris Johnson to stand down as PM and to switch control to Labour
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson has lied, not done what he should do and not followed any scientific guidance when it comes to Covid-19. He has made this country a laughing stock and caused the deaths of so many people due to Covid-19. He is a liability and has no place in the UK government and no place to be Prime Minister.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson must stand down as Prime Minister and hand over control of the UK Government to the Labour party.
